description: Bucket with Usage & Storage Logging Disabled
rationale: Cloud Storage provides usage logs and storage logs. Usage logs cover all requests on a given bucket, while storage logs detail the storage usage of that bucket for the last day. While Cloud Audit Logs are best for tracking API operations in Cloud Storage, usage logs are recommended in specific cases, notably when monitoring access that occurs because a resource has allUsers or allAuthenticatedUsers in its access control settings.
